findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: Cross-file exfiltration chain: 7 files
findings.description: Multi-file exfiltration chain detected: examples/artificial_analysis_to_hub.py, scripts/evaluation_manager.py, scripts/run_eval_job.py, scripts/inspect_vllm_uv.py, scripts/inspect_eval_uv.py, scripts/lighteval_vllm_uv.py, scripts/run_vllm_eval_job.py collect data → encode → examples/artificial_analysis_to_hub.py, scripts/evaluation_manager.py transmit to network
findings.remediation: Review data flow across files: scripts/inspect_eval_uv.py, scripts/run_eval_job.py, scripts/evaluation_manager.py, scripts/run_vllm_eval_job.py, examples/artificial_analysis_to_hub.py, scripts/inspect_vllm_uv.py, scripts/lighteval_vllm_uv.py

findings.title: Cross-file env var exfiltration: 7 files
findings.description: Environment variable access with network calls in examples/artificial_analysis_to_hub.py, scripts/evaluation_manager.py, scripts/run_eval_job.py, scripts/inspect_vllm_uv.py, scripts/inspect_eval_uv.py, scripts/lighteval_vllm_uv.py, scripts/run_vllm_eval_job.py
findings.remediation: Review data flow across files: scripts/inspect_eval_uv.py, scripts/run_eval_job.py, scripts/evaluation_manager.py, scripts/run_vllm_eval_job.py, examples/artificial_analysis_to_hub.py, scripts/inspect_vllm_uv.py, scripts/lighteval_vllm_uv.py
